title: 79/650/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 July 1979 approving an outline programme under Regulation (EEC) No 1760/78 relating to the southern regions of France (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 13 July 1979  approving an outline programme under Regulation (EEC) No 1760/78 relating to the southern regions of France  (Only the French text is authentic)  (79/650/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The outline programme relating to the southern regions of France, communicated by the French Government on 29 May 1979 pursuant to Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 1760/78, is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 July 1979.
For the Commission
Finn GUNDELACH
Vice-President  (1)OJ No L 204, 28.7.1978, p. 1.
